name: Incredible Mandy (itch)
description:
This is an adventure puzzle game with an amazing science fiction story, which is about a brother saves his sister in many challenging dreams.
There are 8 original design chapters in game, each chapter has a puzzle level and ending with a boss fight.
Estimated game time is about 15 hours.

Steam Page:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/857950/

You reach out us at our discord server:

https://discord.gg/GvG73py

Recommended System Requirements:
-Windows 10 x64 bit
-Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz
-4 GB RAM
-NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or higher
-2GB available storage
-1920 x 1080 Monitor Resolution
-Supports Keyboard and Mouse or Xbox Controller

*This game is under developing, some sound effects and story content aren't the final status.
